name: Google Search Plugin
description: A Flask app that uses the Google Custom Search API to search the web and fetch the summary for five first links in the search results as well as inner text of the first three links.

GOOGLE_API_KEY.description: Your Google API key. Create one at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

CUSTOM_SEARCH_ENGINE_ID.description: Your Google Search Engine ID. Create one at https://cse.google.com/cse/create/new

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Your OpenAI API Key. Create one at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys

OPENAI_ORGANIZATION_ID.description: Your OpenAI Organization ID. Lookup at https://platform.openai.com/account/org-settings
